readable.title: 403523132_73b9a1a4b3
readable.content: A dog is about to get a ball that is on orange carpet . A dog on wood floor is staring at a yellow ball that is lying on orange carpet . A little brown dog stares at a tennis ball on an orange carpet . Puppy playing with a tennis ball on an orange rug . The dog crouched on the orange rug and stared at the tennis ball .
